title: DRS Compliance Suite DRS Objects Schema Config

drs_id.description: The DRS ID of the object

expected_status_code.description: The expected status code for testing the DRS object. 200 by default if not provided.

is_bundle.description: True if DRS object is bundle. False by default if not provided.

auth_info.description: Contains `auth_type` and `auth_token` if different than `default_auth`. Uses `default_auth` if not provided.
